core_contexts: EnergyContext: Energy level tracking and pattern analysis
TaskContext: Task management with adaptive recommendations
app_architecture.component_hierarchy: Reusable components for energy indicators, task cards, and accessibility

accessibility_first.screen_reader: Full VoiceOver/TalkBack support with semantic markup
accessibility_first.voice_input: Primary input method with Expo Speech API

energy_adaptive_ux.visual_indicators: Color-coded energy states with consistent iconography
energy_adaptive_ux.progressive_disclosure: Information revealed based on cognitive capacity
energy_adaptive_ux.gentle_interactions: Non-pressuring UI with celebration of effort
energy_adaptive_ux.flexible_timing: Adaptive session lengths and break patterns

neurodivergent_considerations.executive_function_support: Minimal cognitive load for core actions
neurodivergent_considerations.sensory_awareness: Reduced visual clutter, optional haptic feedback
neurodivergent_considerations.time_blindness_accommodation: Visual time indicators and gentle reminders
neurodivergent_considerations.shame_reduction: Positive language, effort recognition, guilt-free rescheduling

energy_check_in_system.visual_feedback: Immediate energy indicator update with animation
energy_check_in_system.context_capture: Optional voice note or text context

adaptive_task_suggestions.algorithm: Energy-appropriate filtering with duration and cognitive load matching
adaptive_task_suggestions.modification_options: One-tap reschedule, effort tracking, gentle completion
adaptive_task_suggestions.accessibility: Clear task hierarchy with cognitive load indicators

flexible_focus_sessions.break_management: Automatic break suggestions with adaptive timing
flexible_focus_sessions.progress_tracking: Visual progress with celebration of partial completion

pattern_recognition_dashboard.visualization: Energy trend charts with accessible color coding
pattern_recognition_dashboard.accessibility: Chart data available via screen reader descriptions
pattern_recognition_dashboard.privacy_focus: All analysis happens locally, no data transmission

source_structure.src/screens/: 5 main screens (Energy, Tasks, Focus, Patterns, Settings)

configuration_files.package.json: Dependencies including Expo SDK, React Native Paper
configuration_files.tsconfig.json: TypeScript configuration for strict type checking
configuration_files.babel.config.js: Babel configuration for React Native compilation
